author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2333: Fix failures during contrib builds, when classes in core were changed without ant clean. This fix also optimizes the dependency management between contribs by a new ANT macro

author: rhuijben
msg: Fix compilation of client-tests on Windows.
(includes): Remove unix only include <unistd.h>. (Can only be used
(test_patch): Use svn_dirent_get_absolute to get the cwd in normalized
form. Assume that joining canonical dirents returns a canonical dirent.

author: ate
msg: Restoring .classpath and .project Eclipse configuration files. To be able to do so, I also need to temporarily remove these from the svn:ignore, will restore that right after this commit.

Although keeping these files in svn isn't exactly "best practice", we've maintained these manually since the beginning of Jetspeed 2.x., and I'd prefer we don't change that anymore for the maintainance branches.
Note: with Jetspeed 2.2.x, this no longer is done (or wanted!) as we now properly use maven-2 for that, e.g. m2eclipse plugin does the trick.
Jetspeed 2.1.x still primarily is maven-1 based and thereby requires a bit more "manual" configuration of its (Eclipse) project (as a single project, not nested).

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2339: deprecate static Directory.copy in favor non-static Directory.copyTo; if it's FSDir -> FSDir, use nio's FileChannel.transferTo
